enchants.name: Accelerate
enchants.description: Increases attack speed for each consecutive shot. Resets one second after the attack.

enchants.name: Anima Conduit
enchants.description: Each soul you absorb grants a small amount of health.

enchants.name: Bonus Shot
enchants.description: Firing a shot also fires a second shot at a nearby enemy. The second shot has reduced damage.

enchants.name: Burning
enchants.description: Every 0.5 seconds damages all enemies in melee range.

enchants.name: Chain Reaction
enchants.description: Has a chance to fire five arrows in all directions on impact.

enchants.name: Chains
enchants.description: Has a 30% chance to chain a cluster of mobs together and keep them bound for a short time.

enchants.name: Chilling
enchants.description: Emits a blast every two seconds that reduces the movement and attack speed of nearby enemies for one second.

enchants.name: Committed
enchants.description: Deal increased damage against already wounded enemies.

enchants.name: Cool Down
enchants.description: Reduces the cooldown time between uses of your Artifacts.

enchants.name: Cowardice
enchants.description: When you are at full HP, you deal increased ranged and melee damage.

enchants.name: Critical Hit
enchants.description: Gives you a chance to inflict critical hits dealing triple damage.

enchants.name: Deflect
enchants.description: Grants a small chance to deflect incoming projectiles.

enchants.name: Echo
enchants.description: Some of your attacks are followed up by another in rapid succession.

enchants.name: Electrified
enchants.description: Rolling zaps three nearby enemies with lightning bolts, dealing damage.

enchants.name: Enigma Resonator
enchants.description: Gives a chance to deal triple damage based on the number of souls you have.

enchants.name: Exploding
enchants.description: Mobs explode after they are defeated.

enchants.name: Explorer
enchants.description: For every one hundred blocks explored on the map, you regain a small amount of health.

enchants.name: Final Shout
enchants.description: When your health drops below 25% all your artifacts are used (ignoring cooldown periods).

enchants.name: Fire Aspect
enchants.description: Sets mobs on fire for 3 seconds, dealing damage over time.

enchants.name: Fire Trail
enchants.description: Rolling creates a trail of fire behind you, which deals damage to mobs for four seconds.

enchants.name: Food Reserves
enchants.description: Whenever you use a healing potion, you also create random food items.

enchants.name: Fuse Shot
enchants.description: Every few shots has a timed charge that explodes one second after impact, dealing 100% damage to nearby mobs.

enchants.name: Freezing
enchants.description: Slows mobs after hit for three seconds.

enchants.name: Frenzied
enchants.description: While you are at less than half health, your attack speed is increased.

enchants.name: Gravity
enchants.description: This effect pulls mobs in range towards the weapon's impact point

enchants.name: Gravity Pulse
enchants.description: A blast occurs every five seconds that pulls nearby enemies towards you.

enchants.name: Growing
enchants.description: The fired shot grows in the air, dealing extra damage to distant targets.

enchants.name: Health Synergy
enchants.description: When activating any artifact, you regain a small amount of health.

enchants.name: Infinity
enchants.description: Chance to immediately replenish an arrow after shooting.

enchants.name: Leeching
enchants.description: Defeating a mob heals you a small portion of the mob's max health.

enchants.name: Looting
enchants.description: Increases the chance for mobs to drop consumables.

enchants.name: Multishot
enchants.description: Grants the chance to fire five arrows at once.

enchants.name: Piercing
enchants.description: Fired arrows sometimes gain the piercing effect, which allows them to fly through multiple mobs.

enchants.name: Poison Cloud
enchants.description: Has a 30% chance to summon a poison cloud that deals damage to enemies in an area for three seconds.

enchants.name: Potion Barrier
enchants.description: Whenever you use a healing potion, you take -90% damage for a short duration

enchants.name: Power
enchants.description: Power boosts arrow damage.

enchants.name: Prospector
enchants.description: Find more Emeralds on fallen enemies.

enchants.name: Protection
enchants.description: Reduces damage taken.

enchants.name: Punch
enchants.description: Boosts arrow pushback.

enchants.name: Radiance
enchants.description: Has a 20% chance to spawn a circular area that heals all allies within it.

enchants.name: Radiance Shot
enchants.description: Has a 20% chance to spawn a circular area that heals all allies within it.

enchants.name: Rampaging
enchants.description: May give you a temporary attack speed boost.

enchants.name: Rapid Fire
enchants.description: Increases your attack speed.

enchants.name: Recycler
enchants.description: Being hit by damage-inflicting projectiles will occasionally craft a small quiver of arrows.

enchants.name: Ricochet
enchants.description: Small chance for arrows to ricochet off mobs.

enchants.name: Sharpness
enchants.description: Makes your weapon sharper, making it deal more damage.

enchants.name: Shockwave
enchants.description: The last attack in a combo launches a shockwave, damaging enemies.

enchants.name: Smiting
enchants.description: Increases damage against the Undead.

enchants.name: Snowball
enchants.description: Fires a snowball at a nearby enemy every few seconds, briefly stunning it.

enchants.name: Soul Siphon
enchants.description: When you hit an enemy, gain a 10% chance to grant you a bunch of extra souls.

enchants.name: Soul Speed
enchants.description: When you gather a soul, you gain a 1% stacking movement speed boost for a short time.

enchants.name: Speed Synergy
enchants.description: When activating any artifact, you gain 20% movement speed for a short time.

enchants.name: Stunning
enchants.description: Chance to temporarily stun enemies.

enchants.name: Supercharge
enchants.description: Charged shots deal more damage and have more pushback.

enchants.name: Surprise Gift
enchants.description: Whenever you use a healing potion, you sometimes create random consumables.

enchants.name: Swiftfooted
enchants.description: Rolling makes you move faster for three seconds.

enchants.name: Swirling
enchants.description: The last attack in a combo performs a swirling attack, damaging nearby enemies.

enchants.name: Tempo Theft
enchants.description: Steals a small amount of a mob's movement speed and gives it to you for four seconds.

enchants.name: Thorns
enchants.description: Whenever you take damage, you deal damage back to the attacker.

enchants.name: Thundering
enchants.description: Has a 30% chance to summon a lightning strike that damages nearby enemies.

enchants.name: Unchanting
enchants.description: Projectiles deal more damage to enchanted enemies.

enchants.name: Wild Rage
enchants.description: Hitting an enemy has a chance to send it into a rage, making it hostile towards everyone.
